author: Staff Reporter
text:
One person was arrested and 65 kg of sea cucumbers, endangered marine species, were seized by Forest Department officials here on Sunday.

According to Forest Guard of Gulf of Mannar Marine National Park, Thoothukudi, A. Kalidoss, the sea cucumbers were stuffed in 11 gunny bags. Acting on a tip-off, the officials launched a combing operation in the house of the accused at Lordhammalpuram here and seized the sea cucumber. Investigations revealed that sea cucumbers would be dried up and processed, before being despatched to China through Sri Lanka. The accused, a habitual offender, was identified as M. Manzoor Ali (27).

He was selling conches. Earlier, he was arrested on a charge of smuggling 66 kg of sea cucumbers in 2010.
title: 65 kg sea cucumbers seized; one held
